title: Sr Software Dev Engineer, Machine Learning, Sponsored Products and Brands Ads Response Prediction
description:
**RESPONSIBILITIES:**
- Enhance scalability and efficiency of training and inference systems.
- Develop LLM inference infrastructure for GenAI workloads.
- Collaborate with scientists to optimize machine-learning models.

**REQUIREMENTS:**
- 5+ years of software development experience.
- Proficient in at least one programming language.
- Experience in system design and architecture.

**KEY TECHNOLOGIES:**
- Machine learning frameworks.
- Large language models (LLMs).
- Real-time inference systems.

title: Sr. Software Dev. Engineer/MLE, AGI Customization
description:
**RESPONSIBILITIES:**
- Lead development of LLM training techniques and optimizations.
- Collaborate with Applied Scientists on data processing and model scaling.
- Investigate design approaches and prototype new technologies.

**REQUIREMENTS:**
- 7+ years of professional software development experience.
- 5+ years of experience in design or architecture leadership.
- Experience mentoring or leading an engineering team.

**KEY TECHNOLOGIES:**
- Machine Learning and AI technologies.
- Software programming languages (e.g., Python, Java).
- Agile/Scrum development methodologies.

title: Jr. Software Development Engineer- San Luis Obispo
description:
**RESPONSIBILITIES:**
- Write software and collaborate with experienced engineers.
- Contribute to impactful deliverables and technical challenges.
- Participate in 1:1 mentoring throughout the internship.

**REQUIREMENTS:**
- Currently enrolled in a Bachelor's or Master's program.
- Majoring in Computer Science, Software Engineering, or related field.
- Available year-round for part-time and full-time work.

**KEY TECHNOLOGIES:**
- Proficiency in Java, Python, or C++.
- Experience with object-oriented design. 
- Familiarity with handling ambiguous problems.

title: Member of Technical Staff - Reinforcement Learning, AGI Autonomy
description:
**RESPONSIBILITIES:**
- Develop multimodal Large Language Models for automation insights.  
- Collaborate with cross-functional teams to solve complex GenAI problems.  
- Mentor junior scientists and engineers for team growth.  

**REQUIREMENTS:**
- PhD or Master's with 5+ years applied research experience.  
- 3+ years building machine learning models for business applications.  
- Strong programming skills in Java, C++, or Python.  

**KEY TECHNOLOGIES:**
- Neural deep learning methods and machine learning frameworks.  
- Experience with TensorFlow or PyTorch.  
- Knowledge of supervised fine-tuning and reinforcement learning.

- Knowledge of supervised fine-tuning and reinforcement learning.

title: Applied Scientist II - AMZ26494.1
description:
**RESPONSIBILITIES:**
- Design and develop data-driven models for ML and NL applications.
- Build and deploy ML models on available data.
- Mentor junior engineers and scientists.

**REQUIREMENTS:**
- Master's degree in Computer Science, ML, Statistics, or related field.
- One year of relevant research or work experience.
- Proficiency in Java, C++, Python, or similar languages.

**KEY TECHNOLOGIES:**
- Statistical modeling techniques (Bayesian models, deep neural networks).
- Machine learning techniques for business and engineering applications.
- Optimization methods for data analysis.
